messages.content:
Hey! We hope you are doing well.
The Sub 126 team wanted to invite you along to our exclusive launch evening this week.
Our much-anticipated opening was just last week, and we wanted to invite you to our event now that weâve found our feet a bit.
This event will be held this Friday from 5-7pm and we would love it if you and a +1 could make it along? You can come by anytime between then, so donât worry if you canât make it for the beginning.
You will get to try some of our delicious food and see the venue in all its glory.
Youâll be able to find us at 126 West Regent Street, G2 2RQ.
Each guest will be able to sample our subs, and a enjoy few refreshments, of course. All we ask is that you post some content on your page letting everyone know about us.
Please note: we primarily offer takeaway, but do have small seating areas inside and outdoors. We expect this event to be busy but there will be lots of food and drinks on offer for everyone to try.
If you could reply on here with your RSVP, that would be great. We hope to see you there!
